resources.string: Choose a genre to start with

Rock music is a genre of popular music. â€¦ Rock music is related to a number of other genres such as blues and folk. It has influences from jazz, classical and other music genres. Musically, rock mostly uses the electric guitar as part of a rock group with bass guitar and drums.

Imagine Dragons is an American pop rock band from Las Vegas, Nevada, consisting of lead singer Dan Reynolds, lead guitarist Wayne Sermon, bassist Ben McKee, and drummer Daniel Platzman.[1]Rolling Stone named "Radioactive", which holds the record for most weeks charted on the Billboard Hot 100, the "biggest rock hit of the year".
